snippet: KAUFMAN-- Robert The Board of Governors, and the members of Glen Oaks Club express our deepest sorrow at the passing of our esteemed member Robert and extend our heartfelt sympathy to his wife Florence and the entire family. Board of Governors Steven Shenfeld, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: KAUFMAN-- Robert The Board of Governors, and the members of Glen Oaks Club express our deepest sorrow at the passing of our esteemed member Robert and extend our heartfelt sympathy to his wife Florence and the entire family. Board of Governors Steven Shenfeld, President 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KAUFMAN, ROBERT THE BOARD OF GOVERNORS
